text:
Name: SABAHAT ZARTAR JAMIL
Email: angelsaba.jamil588@gmail.com
Phone: +91-9113876811

Experience Summary:

Having 3.9 years of varied experience in Data science/Data analytics and TSM.

Employment History: 

Currently working with Infosys ltd., Bangalore as Technology Analyst since Aug 2015 to present.

Profile Overview:

1. Having good knowledge on Data Science Skills such as Basic Statistics, Hypothesis Testing, Exploratory
Analysis, and Predictive Modeling. 

2. Good knowledge of Linux, UNIX, Python Programming, Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn,
ScikitLearn, Networker and TSM. Experience in MS SQL Server, Microsoft technologies like HTML, and
CSS. 

3. Machine Learning Techniques as Linear Regression, Classification (Logistic Regression), Segmentation
(DBSCAN, K-Means), Decision Trees, Ensemble Learning (Random Forest), Text Mining (NLP). 

4. Basic knowledge in hadoop ecosystem including its core and latest component like HDFS,

  Hive ,Sqoop, Flume,Impala, Hbase and Pyspark.

5. Good understanding in doing exploratory analysis and statistical modeling using Python.

Scholastics:

B-Tech with 8.01 DGPA in Information and Technology from Neotia Institute of Technology
Management and Science, Kolkata in year 2015

Technology:

Below is a list of important hardware, software products, tools and methods that I have worked with:- 

Skills:

Data Science Skills Basic Statistics, Hypothesis Testing, Exploratory
Analysis, Predictive Modelling.

Scripting Languages Unix Shell Scripting

Databases SQL Server

Python Libraries Python Programming, Numpy, Pandas,
Matplotlib, Seaborn, ScikitLearn etc.



Machine Learning Techniques Linear Regression, Classification (Logistic
Regression), Segmentation (DBSCAN, K-Means),
Decision Trees, Ensemble Learning (Random
Forest), Text Mining (NLP)

Big Data Ecosystem HDFS, Hive, Sqoop, Flume,Impala, Hbase and
Pyspark

OS Unix and Windows

Domain Expertise:

1. Experience in working on Data science, Python libraries, Machine Learning Techniques and Tivoli
Storage Manager for the EDC project of Daimler AG (Mercedes Benz) 

2. Completed my training successfully in Infosys Mysore on Python, My SQL, PL/SQL, Linux, UNIX and
Windows. 

Certifications:

1. Successful completion of industrial training from Ardent Computech Training Center, Kolkata on
Online Bookstore using PHP5 and My SQL.

2. Successful completion of Data Science training from Analytix lab.

Professional Experience:

Working for Infosys from Aug 2015 to till date

Customer Name: Daimler AMG 

Analytics Edge - Emerging Accounts (Oct 2017 – Present)

Skills:  Python, SQL, Machine Learning

Description:

The objective of being a part of this team is to work across different modules in different projects, which
requires converting raw data into meaningful business insights. Work closely with various teams across
the company to identify and solve business challenges utilizing large structured, semi-structured, and
unstructured data in a distributed processing environment.

Roles & Responsibilities:

Working on end-to-end project modules of Data Ingestion, Data Cleansing, Data Preparation, Data
Splitting, Model Preparation and validation.

Involved in working with distributed computation of large datasets, data retrieval, data preparation,
data cleansing, modeling, exploratory analysis, predictive modeling, model tuning, optimization etc.



Responsibility (Aug 2015 – Oct 2017)

 Tivoli Storage Manager Configuration, Maintenance and Troubleshooting Backup and Restore
using TSM.

 Installing and Configuring a Tape Library Attached to the IBM Tivoli Storage     Manager Server
and Working with Media.

 Managing Storage Pools, Storage Pool Volumes.
 Policy Management, Defining  Policies, Policy Sets, Management Classes and Copy Groups
 Customizing the Tivoli Storage Manager Database and Recovery Log, Sizing  the     Databases and

Recovery Log, Adding Space, Reducing the DB and Recovery Log,     Mirroring, Space Triggers.
 Backup-Archive Client Functions, Backup Sets, Performing Client Backups,  Restoring Files,

Archive and Retrieve, Backup and Restore with the command Line.
 Knowledge on performing backups & restores using web client, GUI & command     Line.
 Enhanced TSM Administration tasks such as migration and Space reclamation.
 Implementation of TSM client, ERP and storage agent
 Monitoring TSM backups (DB online, archive, offline and F/S) and resolving the backup   issues.

 Creating nodes and  defining schedules and associating schedules to particular node by

command mode and GUI

 Check in and Check out Tapes as Scratch

 Triggering backups manually

 Analyzing and performing the trouble shooting for backup issues 

 Implementing and Configuring the Tivoli Common Reporting Tool and Admin Console

 Knowledge on HANA, SQL, Oracle & DB2 database server’s backups.
 Installing Networker client software on UNIX and Windows O/S.
 Knowledge on File system, SQL DB, VADP, and EBR backup configuration on Networker.

Declaration:

I do hereby declare that the information personal and professional, mentioned above are correct and
true to the best of my knowledge and belief.

Sabahat Jamil
